response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential significance to you, I am extending this exclusive offer. I propose a transaction at a price of $950,000, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome. Should you choose to accept this offer, it would be a significant milestone for both of us, marking the beginning of a long-term partnership built on trust and mutual success. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together soon.", "product_price": 950000}
